header.description:
Passionnate about web technologies, I assure a constant follow up about latest trend and technologies to insure a complet accompaniment for your project.

In parallel to my personal goals of starting independent projects, I want to dedicate some of my time to freelance experiences, to solve various problems and meet new teams. Beyond a simple service, I offer an active participation to help you achieve your goals.

My profile allows me to propose a complete service as for the creation of a website or a web application, or as integrating an existing team in support of a specific issue.
header.title: Full stack, Senior Front-end

location.description: Currently on a nomadic lifestyle, I can only accept remote assignments but always arrange to visit the company on site to meet in person.
location.title: Location

mila.stack: Chatbot use Facebook messenger API and runs on existing backend with nodeJS. Front-end and webapp generator are running on typescript/Angular.
mila.work:
Mila connects companies with local self-employed technicians with specific skills.

My mission within the company was experiment threw prototypes that would be taken over by the technical team if deemed viable. During our collaboration, three projects were conducted:

  • A messenger chatbot integrated within the existing infrastructure(Node.js, Facebook API).
  • A schedule management application to manage technicians' schedule (Web application in typescript / Angular).
  • A dynamic component generator for Angular from metadata hosted on the contentful platform (Node.js).

mozilla.stack: Build as a web extention, using react and redux.
mozilla.work:
Mozilla is the company in charge of building the Firefox web browser.

Following discussions on the github platform, I was offered to join the Mozilla Firefox TestPilot team for a 4-month contact to manage all front-end needs of the Notes by Firefox project. Our team was also including a full-time back-end developer and a volunteer contributor. The purpose of the mission was to migrate existing code to react.js / redux, and adding extra features. After two months, all goals reached, we were able to work on a mobile application using react-native, now available on the Google store. All code and contributions are visible on the repository github mozilla/notes.

chefclub.work:
Chefclub offers entertainment around the theme of cooking.

My mission within the Chefclub's team is to manage their web integrations, mainly via their website chefclub.tv. From mockups provided by the graphic team, I implement all screens in responsives design, powered by a Django application. To this day, I remain in constant collaboration with the team on the implementation of seasonal projects, and keep up to date their visual identity.
